description:
Having officially joined the student council, Masachika starts to work hard while actively participating in its activities and interacting with other members alongside Alya. Alya tries to make amends for taking away Yuki’s partner but gets thrown off by Yuki`s words that she loves him more than anyone else. On top of that, Alya feels jealous of Masha, who seems to have warm and friendly conversations with Masachika. Meanwhile, Masachika invites Alya to a family restaurant for a strategy meeting as she aims to become the student council president, but...?
Source: Official Website

titles.title: A Kiss of the Indirect Variety
いわゆるひとつの間接キス
